item.title: CO-82 East at CO-133 South
item.description: CO-82 East at CO-133 South in Carbondale.

item.title: CO-82 East Approaching CO-133 South
item.description: CO-82 East approaching CO-133 South to Redstone and Carbondale. Continue east on CO-82 for Aspen.

item.title: CO-82 East - McClure Pass Status
item.description: CO-82 East - CO-133/McClure Pass Status. McClure Pass is located on CO-133 between Redstone and Paonia.

item.title: CO-82 East - Independence Pass Status
item.description: Independence Pass Status on CO-82 east leaving Glenwood Springs. Typically Independence Pass, just east of Aspen closes between November and May. Independence Pass is one of the highest highway passes in Colorado.

item.title: CO-82 East - Grand Ave. Junction
item.description: CO-82 east at Grand Ave. Junction in Glenwood Springs. Merge right to continue south on Grand Ave.

item.title: I-70 East (Exit 116 Offramp) at CO-82
item.description: I-70 East (Exit 116 Offramp) at CO-82 in Glenwood Springs. Turn left for CO-82 east to Glenwood Springs and Aspen.

item.description: I-70 east approaching Exit 116 - CO-82 East/Glenwood Springs/Aspen.

item.title: I-70 East - Exit 111
item.description: I-70 east approaching Exit 111 - South Canyon.

item.title: I-70 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-70 east. Distance to Glenwood Springs, Gypsum, and Denver.

item.description: I-70 east approaching Exit 109 - Canyon Creek.

item.description: I-70 east approaching Exit 94 - Rifle Garfield County Airport.

item.title: Rifle Rest Area at CO-13
item.description: Exit of Rifle Rest Area at CO-13. Turn right for both directions of CO-13. Just south of this intersection is a roundabout for CO-13 northbound traffic to turn around.

item.title: CO-13 South/To I-70 - Rifle
item.description: CO-13 South/To I-70 - Rifle. This is also US-6, but not signed on this assembly.

item.title: CO-13 South at US-6 - Rifle
item.description: CO-13 South at US-6 in Rifle. CO-13 south joins US-6 east through Rifle. Use US-6 east for I-70 access.

item.title: CO-13 South at US-6
item.description: CO-13 South at US-6 in Rifle. Turn right for US-6 west and for access to I-70 westbound; turn left for US-6 east and CO-13 south and access to I-70 eastbound.

item.title: CO-13 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CO-13 south. Distance to Rifle and I-70.

item.title: I-70 West Exit 116
item.description: I-70 West at CO-82 East Junction
